meanings.definition: Materials that have the ability to absorb and retain large amounts of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The superabsorbents in the sponge soaked up all the water from the spill.
meanings.sent2: The baby's diaper contained superabsorbents to keep them dry.
meanings.sent3: The superabsorbents in the paper towel were so thirsty, they drank up the entire glass of water!
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like superabsorbents, soaking in every detail of the lecture.
meanings.sent5: The superabsorbents in the soil drank up the rain like a sponge.

meanings.definition: Substances used to increase the absorbency of products such as diapers and sanitary pads.
meanings.sent1: The company developed a new type of superabsorbents for their diapers.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers rely on superabsorbents to make their products more effective.
meanings.sent3: The superabsorbents in the diaper whispered to each other, 'Let's show them how absorbent we are!'
meanings.sent4: Her love for reading was like superabsorbents, enhancing her knowledge with every book.
meanings.sent5: The superabsorbents in the fabric transformed the regular pad into a super-absorbent one.
